item.description:
Come and have a good time with us listening to a great funk jazz band , headed up by the fantastic drummer Liviu. In addition, Szechuan Tokyo has both a Japanese (including sushi) and a complete Chinese menu, so we will also be having dinner there !! Liviu's music continues until 11 PM so if you miss dinner, you still can stop in later in the evening as well.

WHEN RESPONDING LET ME KNOW IF YOUR HAVING DINNER WITH US OR NOT !!!

SHOWTIMES: ALL THURSDAY SHOWS ARE 7:30 TO 10:30. ALL FRIDAY SHOWS ARE 8-11, UNLESS OTHERWISE NOTED.

NEW! This logo means that the concert for that date is part of our "Funky Fridays" series; a commitment to diversity presenting jazz in a funky, soulful vein that's geared to appeal to a wider audience than just purists; however, purists fear not - this is all jazz. Jus' the kind you can move to!


The LIVIU POP Funk-Jazz Experience. REPRISE: Bostonians Amy Bowles, keyboards; Aaron Bellamy, bass and special guest James Calandrella, saxophone! Showtime: 8:00.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Meet Up table. Or ask for Stuart

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: The Liviu Pop Funk-Jazz Experience and Dinner @ Szechuan Tokyo Restaurant
